name: mdast-github
description: Auto-link references like in GitHub issues, PRs, and comments
author: Titus Wormer <tituswormer@gmail.com>

scripts.test-travis: npm run test-coveralls && npm run test-cli
scripts.test: npm run test-api && npm run test-cli
scripts.lint-style: jscs --reporter inline index.js cli.js example.js test/index.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-cli && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-script && npm run lint-style
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run test-coverage
scripts.build-readme: mdast --use mdast-toc --use mdast-usage --use index.js -o Readme.md Readme.md
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run build-readme && npm run build-history
